body_content.explanation: to change a graphic, for example one in the form of a bitmap (= a computer image formed from small units called pixels), to a vector image, which can be made into any size without its quality being affected; to be changed in this way:
examples: This software allows you to scan and vectorize logos.
I began with line drawings which I then put into a computer where they were vectorised to become more dynamic.
Many of these freely available images will vectorize well.
